eu_initiatives: To meet with EU officials to learn more about EU political and economic affairs.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership:
EMTA - Emerging Markets Trade Association 
AIMA - Alternative Investment Management Association 
MFA  - Managed Funds Association
goals__remit: Emso provides discretionary investment management to private funds, regulated funds and select managed accounts.  Emso invests primarily in emerging markets debt, and does extensive proprietary research (including political and economic analyses) in advance of making investments.  Emso seeks to broaden its research sources by meeting with members of European parliament on select matters.  Such meetings would be infrequent and only for research purposes.
